text: Melissa Leo (born September 14, 1960 in Manhattan, New York) is an American movie and television actress. She acted in the television series All My Children (2011) and in the movie Oblivion (2013). She won the Golden Globe and the Screen Actors Guild Awards in 2011, for the movie The Fighter (2010). == References == Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:1960 births Category:Living people == Other websites == *Melissa Leo IMDB
title: Melissa Leo
